item.title: Practical Recursion Schemes
item.description: Recursive data types Recursive data structures pop up all over in software from general-purpose structures like lists and binary trees to more application-specific structures like this AST from a simple business rules engine: data BusinessRule input output = IfThenElse (input -> Bool) (BusinessRule input output) (BusinessRule input output) | Return (input -> output) | Stop Functor Foldable The Foldable class gives you the ability to process the elements of a structure one-at-a-time, discarding the shape.
